<!-- What is the Profile? -->

##  {#profile-about data-menu-title="What is the Profile?"}

[**Background** \| What is the Profile?]{.slide-header}

<br> <br> <br> [The ASTHO Profile of State and Territorial Public Health is a longitudinal census that began in 2007 and is fielded every three years to state and territorial health agencies with funding from CDC and RWJF.]{.text} <br> <br> <br> <br>
